description:
So, you want to self-publish your eBook?

Well, you are certainly not alone.

A YouGov poll published last year showed that the most desirable job in the United Kingdom was that of an author. In fact, 60% of the people polled stated that theyâ€™d like to write for a living. And thanks to the developments within the self publishing industry in recent years, there has probably never been a better time to turn this dream into a reality.

But is self-publishing the right choice for you?

In this course, I shall attempt to help you answer this extremely important question, by first asking a series of other questions, such as:

  • Why do you want to self-publish a book?
  • What type of books are you going to write?
  • And are you able to write an interconnected series of books?


Self-publish Your eBook then considers such concepts as perma free books, lead magnets and the willingness to give away high value content to your readers totally FREE of charge.

How much is it going to cost?

Finally, the course looks at the financial costs involved in self-publishing and identifies the 4 Key Financial Investments that every self-published author should make, in order to give yourself the best possible chance of success.

The must-have course for all aspiring self-published authors

If you are thinking about self-publishing a book, or are even considering a part-time career as a self-published author, then the Self-publish Your eBook course is most definitely for you!

Be sure to check out the FREE preview videos within the course curriculum below and I look forward to seeing you on the inside.
title: Self-Publish Your eBook?
